website_summaries.verdict: These easy-to-use spoons cut through your grapefruit but not your tongue.
pros: Set of 4 sturdy and durable grapefruit spoons
Serrated edges easily loosen grapefruit sections
Extra-fine stainless steel with high-luster finish
Also suitable for oranges and kiwi
Long handle is great for use with larger grapefruit
cons: Some find the handle to be uncomfortably sharp when you apply pressure to dig into grapefruit

customer_reviews.title: Just Absolutely PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! This set of grapefruit spoons is terrific. What no one mentions is that the handle is longer, and that's a big deal to me, because I tend to buy these super gigantic grapefruits, so I can really DIG IN and get ALL the fruit in one nice scoop, so I am extra HAPPY! Thanks for a really nice product that I've been looking for to replace the ones I had but got tossed when my little townhouse was unfortunately gutted.
customer_reviews.author: Susie V Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spoons, they are the best I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful these spoons would work well as they are thick and the small blades didn’t seem as sharp as my old ones. I was wrong, they are excellent. I sat down at my desk to eat grapefruit at work today and easily removed nice sections of grapefruit with very little splashing. My old spoons would splatter juice and I had to make a sawing motion. With these, they cut straight through in one motion yet they don’t cut your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: N. Good

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED...
customer_reviews.text: These grapefruit spoons look nice and seem sturdy. However, the serrated edge flares upward slightly so that it is rough against your lips when you use it. Have had many grapefruit spoons over the years and have never had this issue before. Also, the spoon is quite poorly balanced (it has a very thin "throat") so doesn't have a firm feel in the hand. Am returning.
customer_reviews.author: LW Raboys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for scraping out seeds from peppers
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for grapefruit, I got them because they are literally the BEST thing to scrape out the seeds from jalapeños for my bacon wrapped jalapeños. I also used them last night for some other small peppers and they worked awesome. I believe they would do a very good job on grapefruit as well. I highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have these spoons again! I've been searching stores for years to no avail. They make enjoying my Ruby Red grapefruits from South Texas so much easier to enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spons
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice spoons. Sleek and easy to handle. They cut through grapefruit well. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: My order was perfect, I loved the set of spoons and they ...
customer_reviews.text: My order was perfect, I loved the set of spoons and they were identical to spoons my Mother-in-law had 40 years ago. They are sturdy and perfect for removing grapefruit sections. My order came well packed and I was amazed at the rapid shipping I received. Well done to a great Company.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzard52

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great! They're stamped stainless steel but not thin and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great! They're stamped stainless steel but not thin and flimsy like you would expect at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: How did these get high reviews ?  Junk !!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously how are these reviewed so high? The stem part of the handle near the spoon is so narrow and sharp edges it will cut into your fingers as you use it. Plus the serrations on the side or actually relatively dull and they don't cut they mostly tear and you really don't get much fruit with it. Probably wouldn't be able to return them so I guess they're going to get donated somewhere else but they absolutely are horrible for eating grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Temple

customer_reviews.title: They worked great
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up to use with melon and they are great for that, I haven't used them on a grapefruit but I cant imagine them being bad at that either, the only thing that stopped me giving them a 5 star is they would need to be a bit heavier in weight for that. I would not hesitate to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Best Grapefruit Spoons and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and tried many grapefruit spoons, and these are my favorites. I have purchased 3 boxes. The reason I like these the best is due to their shape. Instead of being oval, they are move heart-shaped, which makes them cut more precisely into the grapefruit sections. The serrated edges seem to cut faster with this spoon with others that I have tried, but they are placed in the spoon in a way that doesn't scratch your lip. The feel is solid and does not bend or feel flimsy like other grapefruit spoons. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 10ashus

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they work perfectly! I discovered that it’s really hard to try to eat half of a grapefruit with a regular spoon, so I ordered these. This is a great price for four spoons, and the spoons work great and look very nice. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing Since Grapefruit! 5 S T A R S *****
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent and gets the job done. These spoons also work great on really frozen solid Haagen-Dazs ice cream or Italian ice too! I use them everyday. I can’t get enough grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for peppers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these spoons for grapefruit, but after reading some reviews about using it for cleaning out bell peppers, it's become an essential meal-prep tool in my kitchen. The edges are not sharp enough to cut skin, but it saws right through the pepper veins. The curvature is especially helpful, not only to remove veins, but I'm now able to easily saw around the stem and use the bell pepper's "cap," which I used to just throw away because it was too cumbersome to cut around. I can imagine this as a good tool for kids who want to help prep veggies but can't work with a knife, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: A hard to find item
customer_reviews.text: Just what I'd been looking for. They're not useful just for grapefruit but for cantaloupe and other seeded fruit.
customer_reviews.author: kilvy

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, sharp edges, does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I love these spoons. I had been on medication for 25 years that would not allow me to eat grapefruit. So I donated my grapefruit spoons. But a few months ago I was allowed to stop taking the medication. I soon found out I really needed grapefruit spoons again. I bought these and I am very pleased with them. I can dig out a section without squirting juice into my face. They are a nice weight and are comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Best spoons we have ever had for things like grapefruit. Easily cut right through each section of the fruit and not worry about mess of cutting with a knife. Really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but smudges?
customer_reviews.text: These grapefruit spoons are good quality and exactly what I was looking for. I’m just weirded out because they arrived with smudges on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fear me, grapefruit!
customer_reviews.text: These utensils work wonders on grapefruit and other grapefruit-like produce! I can personally attest that they are compatible with oranges, and I demolished a pummelo in record time using these little beauties! Not certain but these may be banned in the UK as dangerous weapons. Check your local ordinances.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stack

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this serrated spoon. It is very strong - no chance of bending. With the serrated surfaces surrounding the entire top and at least half of each side, it is easy to scoop out squash seeds, which is mainly what I bought it for. I am totally happy with this purchase! Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to love.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Grapefruit Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy fresh grapefruit daily, the spoons are fantastic. I also use the spoons to clean the choke in artichokes, to clean out squash, and anytime I want super control in food prep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for Avocados!
customer_reviews.text: I use this grapefruit spoon to eat avocado halves still in the skin. The serrated edge is perfect for this. The spoon is well balanced and easy to hold. The handle is also a good length.
customer_reviews.author: saythornton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are not worth it. You buy them to eat grapefruit with, and they don’t work. The edges are not sharp enough to cut the pulp, and the spoon is so flat it doesn’t hold the juice! Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Corrinne

customer_reviews.title: Used??
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m over analyzing, but being that I got this for a Christmas gift I am very disappointed. It’s very clear that I received a returned item as the box was falling apart and will not seal. Makes wrapping a little difficult. The plastic packaging the spoons were in were dirty and the spoons had fingerprints all over them. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Delisa

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of spoons.
customer_reviews.text: Wow just wow. I know it’s expensive for four spoons but they were well worth it. I am able to increase the amount of grapefruit I get out of each one. Before I was using an old cereal spoon. It was hard to dig in. With this new spoon it’s so easy to dig in and get a spoon load of grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew I would need grapefruit spoons to eat oranges? Well, it happened. I found the biggest juiciest oranges! The only way to eat them without wearing all the juice was to use a grapefruit spoon. I ordered these, they came right away. They don't look like any others I've had. There is more of a point. They're actually very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Grannycasp

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: We bought two grapefruit spoons a few years ago, but one day they both disappeared from the kitchen drawer where they were for years. I looked at several on Amazon, but picked this set because of the reviews. We are very satisfied with the spoons because the handles are a bit longer than some others, and the spoons really dig into the grapefruit. Now if we can just keep the grapefruit spoon thief away...
customer_reviews.author: N. French

customer_reviews.title: Much needed!
customer_reviews.text: Very much needed! I thought I was just getting one but I got four. That’s what I get for not reading. But I’m totally ok with it! These spoons make grapefruit eating so easy. I don’t know how I’ve went so long without it.
customer_reviews.author: Tesia

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to every drawer
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are so pretty. I bought this set so that I wouldn’t have to worry about misplacing any of my mom’s grapefruit spoons. This set can blend well with any other design of cutlery, in my opinion. Now, I have a proper method of eating grapefruits without cutting my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but looks and feels cheap. it’s sturdy, meaning the spoon handle isn't bending when spooning out a grapefruit section. Holds up in the dishwasher - not loosing it’s not-so-beight finish. These should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just a couple of small nitpicks
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are great, but the bowl could be a little thinner in thickness and the serrations are a little sharp on the mouth at times. But overall the spoons perform very well, with good balance with plenty of strength. They should give yeoman service for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than using a teaspoon.
customer_reviews.text: Grapefruit spoons should make it easy to get all the tasty flesh out of a grapefruit without spraying grapefruit juice everywhere. These do the job well. The edge of the handle is finished but still comes to a fairly hard edge, so it digs into your finger and becomes uncomfortable before you’ve finished a grapefruit half. A rounder edge would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E Kantz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grapefruit and vegie and fruit prep - such as squash, hulling
customer_reviews.text: The order came promptly and as promised. The quality was very good and definitely was a good buy. Would recommend and buy again if I need more. I used mine immediately for cleaning out a winter squash and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slice well.
customer_reviews.text: I have to really get in the grapefruit in order get a slice out. I used it a couple of times but gave up and it is now just taking up space in a kitchen drawer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EMMAROSE

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy spoons. They make eating a grapefruit a pleasure. I never knew they made these until just before I purchase them. They will always be in our silverware drawer from now on :-)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These felt cheap and unappealing in my hand. May have done their job to get the fruit from its peel, but I just wasn't a fan of the feeling of the spoons. I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Grapefruit Spoons!!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are both attractive and sturdy. No more need to pre-cut sections of grapefruit, just dig in with one of these spoons and the sections come right out. No more sticky fingers! I have washed these in my dishwasher several times already and they have come out as shiny as the day I bought them. Worth every penny; you won't be disappointed. High quality!
customer_reviews.author: DereksMommy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These spoons have a very effective cutting edge on tip of spoon. They’re also about a. Half inch to an inch longer than ones I’ve had in the past and that makes them much easier to hold and maneuver
customer_reviews.author: Claudette Wassil

customer_reviews.title: Great value and exactly the right size for grapefruit sections
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of these and that they were stainless steel. The size is perfect for eating one section of grapefruit at a time. The price was amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I've already used these spoons to eat stuffed baked apples and stuffed acorn squash. These spoons are perfect for scooping out tough gourds.
customer_reviews.author: Pamles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy great spoons, a little small
customer_reviews.text: Great set of spoons that work well. The spoon itself is a little small and hard to eat off, but it is easier to get into smaller grapefruits and smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: We use these for grapefruit all the time
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing special about these, they are just regular grapefruit spoons! But we live in Florida, and eat a lot of grapefruit, so they are great to have!
customer_reviews.author: C. Woodring

customer_reviews.title: It was just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it just fine I couldn’t find one in Target or Walmart so I decided to order. I’m happy with my purchase it did what I need it to do with my grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely spoons, flawless finish, work great with grapeferuit
customer_reviews.text: Look like they cou,d be from a highend flatware design...and the round back is easy on the hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally: Perfect execution for a low tech item!
customer_reviews.text: These do exactly as they’re supposed to do but, as others have said, the slightly longer handles make all the difference: They're adult-sized as opposed to the others which seem to be made for children as they tend to stick you in the palm of your hand. I eat a lot of grapefruit — couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cmbnyc1003

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are perfect for digging in to the grapefruit sections and retrieve the meat of the fruit. These are a quality product and very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: AWoman

customer_reviews.title: I love these grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these grapefruit spoons. My oldest grandson and I were eating grapefruit one morning and were having a hard time getting to the fruit. I told him, I bet they make special spoons for grapefruit so of course looked on Amazon. These spoons arrived a few days later and they are just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Bright

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these! They are engineered with a curve such that the edge cuts into your finger uncomfortably with the slightest pressure. I don't usually write reviews, and people often comment on my tough, calloused hands, but I want to let potential buyers know these hurt to use. They are attractive and sturdy, but due to unfortunate engineering, you wouldn't want to eat grapefruit with them.
customer_reviews.author: emon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & practical
customer_reviews.text: The shiny finish on these spoons is lovely, as is the shape. We have other grapefruit spoons that have a dull finish and are narrower at the base, uncomfortable for eating. The best grapefruit spoons we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & multi-use !
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are a Great addition to our hosting utensils. They are nice grapefruit ,ice tea, mixed drink, shake, malt and sundae spoons! Awesome durability and affordability!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: well made, good "teeth"
customer_reviews.text: I got these to dig out avocado meat from the skin. Works great. Also good for eating watermelon "bowls". A good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Rand Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice heavy weight compared to others I've had. I use grapefruit spoons for other uses. They are great with soft boiled eggs the serrated edge takes the top off easily and you can scrape out the egg to eat. I also use to clean out winter squash before cooking so the heavier steel comes in handy
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great for many things
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with spaghetti squash. Have used them for cucumbers as well to make cucumber sandwiches. Not just for grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: rheami

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Good grapefruit spoons, needed to stock up to add some more to our collection. I’ve had our other set for years, still fantasic
customer_reviews.author: ND_2016

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these spoons as stocking stuffers for my citrus-loving daughters. Grapefruit has never been so enjoyable since we got these spoons! They even use them for oranges! They are simple and attractive, easy to hold and use, and wash well in the dishwasher. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: JonAsh

customer_reviews.title: Great value; great product
customer_reviews.text: These work beautifully. The serrated edge cus through even the toughest grapefruit sections, and I had no issues with the spoon cutting my lip.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the seller. They arrived on time. The spoons are just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I grew up using grapefruit spoons. When I moved out and I was eating grapefruits it drove me crazy to not have these. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Nice and sturdy. I’ve purchased some in the past that would bend when I used it to eat honeydew melon. These are much better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Works on grapefruit
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a spoon would make a difference but these do. They have sharp sides that really scoop out the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: cool in Rocklin

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: I'm no metallurgist. I'm no flatware expert. All I know is I needed a better way to eat a grapefruit and these spoons made it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jamestown 112

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Smooth edges. Slice easily through grapefruit.
customer_reviews.text: These are much better than the ones my mom had. Although they slice right through the grapefruit, they aren’t the least bit sharp in your mouth. Nice and smooth. I’m so glad I finally remembered to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Whieldon

customer_reviews.title: Made to last!
customer_reviews.text: Great: Strong heavy spoon with longer handles- these spoons won't bend like the flimsy light weightones that are more common. I used these to eat cantalope-- the length of the handle makes it much easier to dig into the mellon.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Sharpelser
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Some of the sharper edged ones that I have seen. Nice and sturdy, too. They won't bend.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: What a great purchase. I have one at work and the others are at home for use. This grapefruit spoon is so much better to use while eating grapefruits, than a regular spoon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: Has a very solid sturdy feel and an aggressive set of teeth which makes it an excellent tool for cleaning out vegetables like squash, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Gille

customer_reviews.title: SERRATION IS ON WRONG SIDE FOR A RIGHT HANDER
customer_reviews.text: WHY IS THE SERRATION ON THE RIGHT SIDE? THE NATURAL MOTION WOULD SUGGEST IT SHOULD BE ON THE LEFT SIDE. I WILL CORRECT THIS RATING IF SOMEONE CAN EXPLAIN.
customer_reviews.author: ken_norcal

customer_reviews.title: Order not complete.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at my orders and just realized that it was for for grapefruit spoons and I only received two. Will follow up with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted--think they will help taking the seeds out of the squash my family loves
customer_reviews.author: S L Riner

customer_reviews.title: They Work perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these little spons. I have big hands and yet they felt like a precision instrament when I used them to enjoy my grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Anthony Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Wife wanted some grapefruit spoons so I looked for the best deal on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted some grapefruit spoons so I looked for the best deal on Amazon. Found this pack and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Right price, right quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as ordered. Quality appears good (we’ve only used them twice). Serrations are sharp and they cut through grapefruit with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Afraid it would be super cheap but surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Considering how cheap these are I figured the quality would be garbage, but! They are surprisingly well made and do the job of slicing grapefruit flesh without splashing too much. Are they the best on the market? Probably not but you'd be hard pressed to find a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact it was four spoons in the package. They are good quality, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: erica spann

customer_reviews.title: Best price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to find and buy on Amazon. Don't bother looking in the stores like Walmart. These are great quality and great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa112

customer_reviews.title: serrated on the sides as well as the tip
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would work well to remove the seeds and strings out of various squash before baking them. Worked great, especially with the serrated edge round the sides.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a gift and was very disappointed with them. They are very hard to hold as they are so narrow which makes them also very uncomfortable and hard to get good leverage with them. I would not recommend nor would I ever buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: dana keller

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used a grapefruit spoon before and this one is just what one should be.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much that I have tried to eat other citrus fruit like a grapefruit! The don’t work as well for oranges and clementines (to be expected) but wow they’re a game changer for grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: elaina

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Long delivery LT.. product is HD and acceptable product for purchase..and use.👍
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I just received these in the mail several days ago and used them for the first time this morning. I like them a lot. They work well getting the grapefruit meat out. I also like the longer handles. I would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Had these almost 1 year, very happy with how they still look look new and that they haven't bent at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Henry S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Feels good in your hand. Nice design. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great grapefruit spoons!! Nice weight. Would buy these again,!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received order promptly. Description is accurately shown. Will order more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: great for hulling strawberries
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for hulling our strawberries, good price, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JillHannah

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: I like the serrated edge coming down the sides not just the tip And they were attractive
customer_reviews.author: Kitty S.

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: You never know what you're going to get, but these are sturdy and the serrated points dig really well into the grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Handy spoon for grapefruit
customer_reviews.text: It's a spoon designed to extract the sections of a grapefruit to make eating the fruit easier. It works well and the price is very fair.
customer_reviews.author: H. S. Gersten

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with how these spoons work:) Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Birdie, Ky

customer_reviews.title: The kitchen utinsel you didn't know you needed
customer_reviews.text: If you love grapefruit you need a grapefruit spoon. They are life changing.
customer_reviews.author: TheBlueGrassCat

customer_reviews.title: It'll do.
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as the grapefruit knife, but far more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D. Jager

customer_reviews.title: Solid stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these spoons to use when I eat grapefruits and I must say I was not disappointed with the quality. Its weight is substantial and feels solid in your hand. It goes well with my other silverware. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon
customer_reviews.text: this spoon works great . makes eating grapefruit a lot more enjoyable...cant eat grapefruit without one
customer_reviews.author: EVAN CLESS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for spoons like these It is amazing how hard they are to find. Love these - work great, reasonably priced and got through Amazon in no time at all. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Were just what was needed to only use one utensil to eat my grapefruit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I especially like the pointed tip, which makes it easier to dig out small sections.

customer_reviews.title: Best grapefruit spoons on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these spoons, not only for eating grapefruit but for scooping out tomatoes as well. They work to perfection. Amazon delivered within a day and the spoons were beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Summers

customer_reviews.title: 3 spoons great one with defect
customer_reviews.text: These spoons work great as grapefruit spoons. The handle could be a little longer. Disappointed one spoon has a defect in the metal on the back so only three are usable. I contacted the company but they did not reply.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Solid, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the weight of these spoons and how solid and high quality they are!
customer_reviews.author: Angela E Raley

product_meta.title: Hiware 4-piece Grapefruit Spoons, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Try our simple, yet elegant stainless steel grapefruit dessert spoons today!

HIWARE is the definitive kitchenware brand with over 20 years of foodservice and hospitality industry experience. Reliable and trusted by professionals, our commercial lines of products, span from tabletops, restaurant kitchens supplies to utensils. We are now very proud to make our tools and gadgets available to any home cook and hope to give them the joy of using quality utensils loved by professionals.
feature_bullets: Set of 4 sturdy and durable grapefruit spoons - Serrated edges easily loosen grapefruit sections
Extra-fine stainless steel grapefruit spoon with a bright and luster finish maintain its gleam over time
Dig into that juicy grapefruit with the proper utensil, suitable for oranges and kiwi fruit
Simple design makes it easy to match them with existing flatware in your kitchen
